blog/ababool-in-production-with-nginx-an.title: How To Set Up Ababool for production with Nginx and pm2
blog/ababool-in-production-with-nginx-an.description: In this post we are going to explain how to put Ababool in production using nginx as a reverse proxy web server and pm2 to keep the application alive.
blog/ababool-in-production-with-nginx-an.author: Ciro Artigot

blog/ababool-transitions.title: Ababool page transitions
blog/ababool-transitions.description: The Ababool pages can use 64 different animations and CSS3 transitions. Every time a page is requested, the page will use a different animation.
blog/ababool-transitions.author: Ciro Artigot

blog/ababool-animations.title: Ababool element animations
blog/ababool-animations.description: Animate any element of your page.The element animation will be triggered when the element becomes visible: when the pages loads or scrolling to the element.
blog/ababool-animations.author: Ciro Artigot

blog/ababool-modals.title: Ababool Modals
blog/ababool-modals.description: Launch nice animated modals on-click, on load and when the scroll reaches to the bottom of the page.
blog/ababool-modals.author: Ciro Artigot

blog/ababool-thanks-and-codes.title: Thanks and used codes.
